description: Lasso Model fit with AIC or BIC

param.name: fit_intercept
param.description: Whether to calculate the intercept for this model.

param.name: normalize
param.description: This parameter is ignored when fit_intercept is set to False.

param.name: max_iter
param.description: Maximum number of iterations for conjugate gradient solver.

param.name: eps
param.description: The machine-precision regularization in the computation of the Cholesky diagonal factors

param.name: positive
param.description: When set to True, forces the coefficients to be positive.
